on_entry: /execute as @s[tag=ridden] run tellraw @p {"rawtext":[{"selector": "@s"}, {"text":" is low on energy! It needs to rest in order for it to regenerate!"}]}
/execute as @s[tag=ridden] run tellraw @p {"rawtext":[{"selector": "@s"}, {"text":" has no energy! It needs to rest!"}]}

transitions.jumpDelay: v.x = 0.0; for_each(t.rider, query.get_riders, { v.x = v.x + (t.rider -> query.is_jumping); }); return v.x > 0.0 && query.is_tamed && query.is_on_ground && query.has_rider && query.property('rift:energy') > 30 && query.is_ignited;

transitions.jump: v.x = 0.0; for_each(t.rider, query.get_riders, { v.x = v.x + !(t.rider -> query.is_jumping); }); return v.x > 0.0;
